text: X-Men '97 is an American superhero animated television series. It was created by Beau DeMayo for Disney+. It is a spin-off of the children's television series X-Men: The Animated Series. The story is set one year after the series finale episode of the original X-Men Series. == Plot == In 1997, one year after the death of the X-Men's leader, Professor X, the X-Men face new challenges. Category:2020s American animated television series Category:Disney+ original television series
title: X-Men '97
